SCTX:
begin Strong_Build3_T

short daysPassed
short myDay

if ( Stronghold > 5 )
	StopScript Strong_Build3_T
	Return
endif

if ( daysPassed == 0 )
	set myDay to Day
	set daysPassed to 1
endif

if ( myDay != Day )
	set daysPassed to daysPassed + 1
	set myDay to Day
endif

if ( GetPCCell "Uvirith's Grave" == 0 )
	if ( daysPassed > 5 )
		Journal HT_Stronghold 300
		set Stronghold to 6
	endif
endif

End
